detail_desc: Wide, long dress in a pattern-weave viscose with a collar, buttons at the top and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Wide, long dress in a pattern-weave viscose with a collar, buttons at the top and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Detachable tie belt at the waist and long, slightly wider sleeves with covered buttons at the narrow cuffs. Unlined.

Set in soft cotton. Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, a print motif at the top, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Top in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), long sleeves and a round, ribbed neckline. Dungarees in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable buttons at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a gathered V-neck, pleat at the front, slit at the cuffs, and rounded hem.

Dungarees in woven fabric with buttons at the sides, adjustable straps and fasteners, and front pockets.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a pompom on top and a ribbed turn-up at the hem with a fabric appliqué. Fleece lining.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a stand-up collar, smocked yoke and long, wide sleeves with smocked cuffs. Seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a glittery text print on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist, all-over print and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a glittery text print on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist, all-over print and ribbed hems.

Set with a glittery tulle skirt and a pair of bat wings with a glitter print. Skirt with an elasticated waist and asymmetric hem. Wings with a metal rim and elastic shoulder straps. Size approx. 22x39 cm.
Short dress in a stretch weave with a round neck and long, cuffed sleeves. Concealed zip down the back and a gently tapered waist with a seam. Unlined.
Dress in a double-layered cotton weave with embroidery on the shoulders, a decorative bow at the neck, a small opening with a button at the back of the neck, and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Wide waist belt in suede with a round, covered buckle. Width 4.5 cm.
Set with a long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Soft bootees in pile with embroidery and appliqués. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Soft bootees in pile with embroidery and appliqués. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in jersey containing glittery threads with a V-neck front and back, a concealed press-stud at the front and narrow, elastic shoulder straps. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Calf-length lace dress with adjustable spaghetti straps, a V-neck and concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with pleats and a flared skirt. Lined in contrasting colour jersey.
3/4-length trousers in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.

Dance shoes in imitation leather with a glittery elastic panel over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and pleat at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a gentle V-neck and spaghetti shoulder straps with crossover lacing at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist, a flounced trim at the top, and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Short, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a round neck and short sleeves.
Short, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a round neck and short sleeves.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high, frill-trimmed elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high, frill-trimmed elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.

Lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the hem. Light support. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Short, oversized dress in soft cotton jersey with an embroidered motif at the top. Ribbed collar, button placket, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Glittery cardigan in soft pile with long sleeves and no fasteners. Jersey lining.

Padded, gently fitted gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud, and smocking at the sides. Lined.

Padded, gently fitted gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud, and smocking at the sides. Lined.
Short dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and short sleeves with a tie detail. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft, thin weave with fringed trims.

Short-sleeved nightdress in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Metal earrings in various sizes and designs, two pairs with resin pendants. Length from approx. 2.7 cm to 5.5 cm.
Boxy jumper in rib-knit wool containing some cashmere with a wide polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Boots in imitation leather with block heels. Lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 8 cm.

Shirt in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave in a relaxed fit. Collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Pyjama top and shorts in patterned satin. Sleeveless top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a V-neck. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and rounded hems with wrapover sides.

Short dress in an airy, softly draping viscose weave with a gathered, stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
